Package cli

Class BattleCLI

java.lang.Object
cli.BattleCLI
public class BattleCLI extends Object
The Class BattleCLI. The Command line interface for the battle

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    enemyFight()
    Method to randomly select the enemy's fight option
    void
    fight()
    Method to fight the user's monster against an enemy monster.
    int
    getUserFight()
    Method to get the users fight choice for the current round of the battle Checks user's monster's energy level to ensure energetic fight options are appropriately shown Uses userSelectionInput method to obtain the users choice
    void
    helpMenu()
    Help menu to explain all of the different fighting methods
    void
    mainMenu()
    The main menu that the user will interact with Allows all the users to call on other methods
    void
    selectEnemies()
    Method to allow users to select an enemy to battle Uses userSelectionInput to obtain a user choice
    void
    selectItem()
    Allows an item to be selected from the user's list If the user has no items, it tell's the user and returns Once an item is used, it is applied to the monster by calling a method on items
    void
    selectUser()
    Method to allow users to select one of their monsters to fight Uses userSelectionInput to obtain a user choice

    Method to get a user choice from 0 to a given input Uses scanner to obtain user input

  • Method Details

    • selectEnemies

      public void selectEnemies()
      Method to allow users to select an enemy to battle Uses userSelectionInput to obtain a user choice

    • selectUser

      public void selectUser()
      Method to allow users to select one of their monsters to fight Uses userSelectionInput to obtain a user choice

    • userSelectionInput

      public int userSelectionInput(int size)
      Method to get a user choice from 0 to a given input Uses scanner to obtain user input
      Parameters:
      size - , the number of choices
      Returns:
      userChoice, an integer representing the choice

    • getUserFight

      public int getUserFight()
      Method to get the users fight choice for the current round of the battle Checks user's monster's energy level to ensure energetic fight options are appropriately shown Uses userSelectionInput method to obtain the users choice
      Returns:
      userChoice, an integer representing the user choice

    • enemyFight

      public void enemyFight()
      Method to randomly select the enemy's fight option

    • fight

      public void fight()
      Method to fight the user's monster against an enemy monster. Call's getUserFight to determine method chosen Call's getAttackDefence to determine damage inflicted on both monsters Should a monster die, the match ends, returned to the main screen

    • viewMonsters

      public void viewMonsters()
      Print's user monster and enemy monster. Will state if a user has not selected either monster

    • selectItem

      public void selectItem()
      Allows an item to be selected from the user's list If the user has no items, it tell's the user and returns Once an item is used, it is applied to the monster by calling a method on items

    • helpMenu

      public void helpMenu()
      Help menu to explain all of the different fighting methods

    • mainMenu

      public void mainMenu()
      The main menu that the user will interact with Allows all the users to call on other methods
